parameter.name: processQueriesTimeInterval
parameter.description: this will determine the 'cool off' period between invokations of the 'process queries' script.\n this script scans and refreshes the status of queries in the 'running' state untill they are completed\n

parameter.name: DBMaxConnctionAttempts
parameter.description: max number of connection attempts to be made when server replies with error code 2006/2013 (SQL server has gone away..)

parameter.name: fetchXMLRecordsPagingBufferSize
parameter.description: max number of records that will be fetched from db on each cycle during the 'fetching xml' stage

parameter.name: renderKMLMemoryBufferSize
parameter.description: max number of Bytes of the generated KML string, that will be held in memory on any given moment, during the 'render kml' stage.\n when this limit is reached, kml string is dumped to disk.

parameter.name: fetchXMLMemoryBufferSize
parameter.description: max number of Bytes of the generated XML string, that will be held in memory on any given moment, during the 'fetch xml' stage.\n when this limit is reached, xml string is dumped to disk.

parameter.name: fetchXMLChunkSize
parameter.description: xml files bigger than this value will be splitted into smaller pieces.

parameter.name: EdgeDetailsNumOfRecords
parameter.description: The number of records presented at the link table.
